That being said, here is the list with my responses:

put down your friends - gross
say things to scare you - gross
make you do something embarrassing - gross
encourage you to open up - hot
open to your ideas - hot
excited to see you - hot
listen attentively to you - hot
make an effort with your family - hot

I hope this helps, and I want to reiterate that our relationship should be built on mutual respect, trust, and kindness.
